_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The seven fruits and benefits of develop: Attaining enlightenment early on in this very life
Attaining enlightenment at the time of death
Extinguishing the five lower fetters in between one life and the next
Heading upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm
